articles.title: Foxconn profit surges on AI demand, but more conservative on 2025 outlook
articles.content: TAIPEI -Taiwan's Foxconn, the world's largest contract electronics maker, posted a 91% leap in first-quarter profit and beat the market forecast on strong demand for artificial intelligence servers,...

articles.title: Tech Advances on Renewed AI Momentum - Tech Roundup
articles.content: Shares of technology companies rose as the sector returned to the green for the year to date on renewed artificial-intelligence ebullience. The SPDR Select Sector Technology fund, which tracks the...

articles.title: Google needs 'big bang breakup' that would value its businesses at $3.7 trillion as AI threatens Search: Analyst
articles.content: Alphabet investors would be better off breaking up Google as it struggles to prove that its search engine can maintain dominance in the AI chatbot era, DA Davidson analyst Gil Luria told Yahoo Finance in an interview Tuesday.

articles.title: Google announces 1B+ RCS messages sent in the US daily
articles.content: During the Android Show leading up to Google I/O, Google on Tuesday offered a brief update on the adoption of the RCS (Rich Communication Services) protocol, an upgrade to SMS that offers high-resolution photos and videos, typing indicators, read receipts, improved group chat, and more. The company shared that the messaging standard now supports over a billion messages per day in the U.S. This metric is based on an average of the last 28 days, Google noted. articles.title: Google Unveils Major Android Redesign Ahead of iPhone Overhaul

articles.title: ChatGPT: Everything you need to know about the AI-powered chatbot
articles.content: ChatGPT, OpenAI’s text-generating AI chatbot, has taken the world by storm since its launch in November 2022. What started as a tool to supercharge productivity through writing essays and code with short text prompts has evolved into a behemoth with 300 million weekly active users. 2024 was a big year for OpenAI, from its partnership with Apple for its generative AI offering, Apple Intelligence, the release of GPT-4o with voice capabilities, and the highly-anticipated launch of its text-to-video

articles.title: US–China deal is a 'dream scenario' for Apple and Nvidia
articles.content: The Nasdaq 100 (^NDX) is gaining, erasing "Liberation Day" losses following the US and China's agreement to a temporary tariff cut. Wedbush Securities managing director and global head of technology research Dan Ives joins Catalysts to take a closer look at the tech space, specifically Apple (AAPL) and Nvidia (NVDA). To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Catalysts here.

articles.title: Is the Fed on the Right Track?
articles.content: The Fed's continued wait-and-see approach to tariff policy, inflation, and interest rate cuts.  Motley Fool contributor Jason Hall talks through his time at Berkshire Hathaway's annual meeting in Omaha, Warren Buffett's plan to step down as CEO, and what to expect from Greg Abel.

articles.title: Nvidia stock surges 5%, company rejoins $3 trillion club amid flurry of trade news
articles.content: Nvidia rejoined the $3 trillion club Tuesday for the first time since February.
